definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The ureter has been opened to reveal multiple small glistening "bumps" on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 输尿管已剖开可见表面多个小的反光性突起物。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the therapeutic effect of holmium-laser on ureteroceles.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨钬激光治疗输尿管口囊肿的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of the ureteral radiolucent calculi.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高输尿管阴性结石的诊治水平。

sentences.english: Methods The pelvis pressure was reduced through urine drainage from catheter under cystoscope.
sentences.chinese: 方法通过膀胱镜输尿管插管引流尿液使肾盂压力降低。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the diagnosis and treatment of ureteral polyp.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨输尿管息肉的诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the kidney, ureteral calculi with extracorporeal shock wave treatment.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肾及输尿管结石体外冲击波的治疗效果。

sentences.english: On retrograde pyelography the catheter is curved as"S"shape.
sentences.chinese: 逆行肾盂造影时输尿管导管弯曲，呈“S”形。

sentences.english: Objective To review the management of vesicoureteral reflux(VUR) secondary to neurogenic bladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经性膀胱患儿输尿管反流的治疗措施。

sentences.english: They had a total of 71 ureters.
sentences.chinese: 总的出现结石的输尿管有71条。

sentences.english: Intravenous pyelography played an important role in diagnosis of small ureter stone.
sentences.chinese: 静脉肾孟造影对输尿管小结石有重要作用。

sentences.english: There were multiple polypoid tissue in the bladder.
sentences.chinese: 剔除膀胱及输尿管周围多余脂肪组织。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the complications of ureteroscopy as well as their management.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结输尿管镜手术并发症及其预防和处理措施。

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the applied value of ureterorenoscopy in cholelithiasis surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨输尿管肾镜在胆道结石外科的应用价值。

sentences.english: Objective To increase the ultrasonic diagnostic accuracy of calculus in the middle-lower ureter.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对输尿管中下段结石的超声诊断符合率。

sentences.english: All cases were followed up from 3 to 24 months.
sentences.chinese: 随访3～24个月，无输尿管狭窄和结石复发。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate ultrasonic diagnosis of urolithiasis in allograft kidneys .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肾移植后移植肾输尿管结石的超声诊断。

definition: sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
